entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NAOT: isinst with multiple guesses without fallback #97602
    Future
  • NAOT: fold "always false" typechecks #97601
    9.0.0
  • NoGCRegion decommits memory in an inconsistent way #97600
  • Reproducible Crash iOS AOT GlobalizationNative_LoadICUData #97599
  • [API Proposal]: Expose span-based `char.[Try]Parse` publicly #97598
  • [browser] InterpPgoTests.FirstRunGeneratesTableAndSecondRunLoadsIt #97597
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'emitVerifyEncodable(ins, size, dstReg, srcReg)' during 'Generate code' #97587
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Redundant (implied) type test is not folded #97581
    Future

Closed

  • Unexpected behavior with nested [InlineArray] #97603
  • `System.Net.NameResolution.Functional.Tests` - crashed with `Process terminated. Assertion failed.` #92793
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: massive regressions on 1/17/2024 11:26:01 PM #97399
  • NullReferenceException in double arithmetic C++/CLR Jit Stage 2 assambly #97136
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in LINQ #96852
    9.0.0
  • Analyzer suggestion : replace .OrderBy().First() with MinBy() #87921
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] ARM: Implement the EABI #97604
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • handle null value when deserializing JsonDocument #97596
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix GT_XCHG for byte on x86 #97593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Switch WindowsSpecificBehavior host tests to pre-built assets #97586
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Remove installer/tests/Assets/TestUtils/SDKLookup #97583
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective (Take 2) #97578
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • Add TensorPrimitives.ConvertTruncating/Saturating/Checked #97572
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move DNS EventSource tests to RemoteExecutor #97585
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Use Replace helper when converting backslashes #97582
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Remove some dead/redundant code in Uri #97579
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm64 encoding for IF_SVE_DE_1A group #97557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT] ARM: Add RhpLockCmpXchg8 and RhpLockCmpXchg16 #97588
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tweak Enumerable.ToArray to reduce some overheads #97458
    area-System.Linq
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Enable R2RDump #97156
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HW_4A` to `SVE_HW_4B_D` #97433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove workarounds for lack of 'scoped' in Uri #97580
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Improve performance of Order{By}{Descending}(...).First/Last #97483
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance

Updated

  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Refactor how the embedded rounding is handled so the logic is more reusable #97569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] send cancel to abandoned threads with event loop during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #2 #97480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Enable `DerivedCancellationTokenSource`, `AbandonExisting` #97545
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix problem with fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #97493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Display names of handles in dumps #97573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Replace SPKI hashing with a managed implementation #97559
    area-System.Security
  • Use non locking atomic intrinsics #97527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce locking around TypeVarTypeDesc creation #97531
    area-VM-coreclr
  • updating area ownership within mono and coreclr #97571
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Struct copies have unexpectedly bad CQ #2351

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero shadow locals using a single `memset` #2498
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not spill nulls #2497
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for diffing LLVM bitcode to `wasmjit-diff.ps1` #2496
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.content:
Issues

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [VB] String comparison with string constants can be optimized to either of `String.Equals` (`String.op_Equality`, `op_Inequality`), `String.IsNullOrEmpty`, or `String.CompareOrdinal` #71835

Closed

  • Improve error message for CS9008 #71832

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.2.0.7535 #71837
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support implicit reference conversions with arrays #71836
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use raw strings in tests #71834
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Get diagnostic without codefix #71833
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change an ApplyChangeToWorkspace overload to remove some async #71830
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Use collection expressions for arrays #71820
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Throw a nicer exception if GetRequiredDocument gets a generated document ID #71831
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add strong contract assertion about project syncing #71828
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure related docs in the preview workspace link to same sourcetext #71825
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing #71829
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor routing in .NET 8 interpreting %2f as / #53668
  • Native AOT support for MVC #53667
  • Perf improvement: https #53666
  • Blazor .NET 8 - AOT fails with llvm-size.exe step #53664
  • Blazor SSR not working on IOS. #53663
  • InteractiveServer StateHasChanged not firing but works with InteractiveWebAssembly #53662
  • EventCallback problem with abstract types #53661
  • IConfiguration binding throws or returns erroneous data when configuration models have constructors #53659
  • Always signed out after 30 minutes--more info #53658
  • Support HTTP/2 Dynamic Window Sizing in Kestrel #53657
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Perf regression: single_query, updates #53660
  • SpaProxyLaunchManager should use job objects on Windows to kill orphened child processes #53546
  • MVC Razor/Blazor Component Validation #53611
  • Stuck in Blazor Training "Download the Blazing Pizza assets and starter files" #52001
    Discussions
  • Unexpected RST after client FIN for non-chunked responses #49236

PullRequests

Updated

  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • If Resources/Raw exceeds specific size, iOS deployment doesn't work #20201
  • [iOS] Keyboard covers content at bottom of screen in a ScrollView #20200
  • [iOS] Page titles do not appear until navigating when pushing a modal page at startup #20199
  • Window SizeChanged doesn't fire on Mac Catalyst #20198
  • Reproducible Crash iOS AOT GlobalizationNative_LoadICUData #20197
  • Pre-filled Entry ignores TextColor on iOS #20196
  • ViewCells are not GC'ed on iOS, causing cascading memory leak #20195
  • Suggestion: Add "Mobile" tag to MAUI project templates #20190

Closed

  • IsEnabled not working properly for layout #18977

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    community ✨
  • Adding Mobile tag to MAUI project templates #20191
  • Fixed Shell.NavBarHasShadow on Android #20188
    community ✨

Merged

  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺, .NET 8 SR3

Updated

  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • utsav9904:#19458 i solve this to gone to the code #20172
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NorthwindSetOperationsQuerySqlServerTest.Intersect_nested failed #32940
  • Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32939
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type ''. The exception 'Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions`1[Project3.Data.TestContext]' while attempting to activate 'Project3.Data.TestContext'.' was thrown while attempting to create an instance. For the different patterns supported at design time #32936

Closed

  • Identity Annotation is not updated by migration #28377
  • Support cache when creating a sequence #11261
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite issue with multiple Blob colums #32747
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Also catch type initialization errors when attempting to load types that might not exist #32938
  • Stop specifying incorrect column name in snapshot for owned type of generic entity type #32937

Merged

  • Support resetting SQL Server IDENTITY #32931
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Core issue with multiple Blob colums #32770
    waiting-for-response, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891
    needs-design
  • Add fill factor to keys and unique constraints #32900
  • Fix incremental builds #32860
  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518
  • Translate x.parse #28337
